name: APIMorph
tagline: A Polymorphic API for rapid front-end prototyping and API mocking
body:
Now that front-end development has never been so fast, I wondered : Why is my API not able to follow the pace of my AngularJS client?!

Tired of that situation, I took advantage of a private hackathon organized by some folks at [Lateal Throughts](http://www.lateral-thoughts.com/) to start the project and Rony (@obigroup) and I developped a little API able to accept any request you can make and answer RESTfully like you hope it would !

# A Full Featured CRUD API
One is able to use a full feature (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH) REST (and HATEOAS) API.

For instance

    curl -XPOST -d '{ "username": "MaximeGaudin" }' http://localhost:8091/users

creates a new endpoint `/users` :

    curl http://localhost:8091/users
